text: Héctor Sandarti is a Guatemalan television host and actor who was the host of the Spanish-language version of Deal or No Deal (called Vas o No Vas) on the Telemundo Network in the United States. He held similar duties in 2004–2006 for a Mexican version which aired on Televisa. He also worked in Hospital el paisa with Galilea Montijo. He has also hosted "Vida TV" for the TV network as well as a Mexican version of Big Brother. Plus, he has also worked in "Fantastico Amor" with Galilea Montijo. announcing duties included Atinale al Precio (Mexico's version of The Price Is Right) in 2000 and the comedy show Objetos Perdidos. ==References== ==External link== Category:1968 births Category:Guatemalan game show hosts Category:Guatemalan emigrants to Mexico Category:People from Sacatepéquez Department Category:Living people Category:Mexican game show hosts Category:Guatemalan male stage actors Category:Guatemalan male telenovela actors Category:Guatemalan male television actors Category:21st-century Guatemalan male actors
title: Héctor Sandarti
